app: 安美数字酒店宽带运营系统
seo: 安美数字酒店,weather.php,任意文件读取漏洞,高危漏洞
seo_en: Anmei Digital Hotel,Broadband Operation System,weather.php,File Read Vulnerability,High Risk Vulnerability
summary: 检测安美数字酒店宽带运营系统是否存在weather.php任意文件读取漏洞，通过构造特定payload验证漏洞是否存在，并输出相关信息。
summary_en: Detect whether the Anmei Digital Hotel Broadband Operation System has a weather.php arbitrary file read vulnerability, verify the existence of the vulnerability by constructing a specific payload, and output relevant information.
